statements: SELECT * FROM media_mergers
SELECT merger_date, media_company, acquiring_company FROM media_mergers
SELECT merger_id, market_impact FROM media_mergers ORDER BY market_impact DESC
SELECT media_company, market_impact FROM media_mergers WHERE market_impact > 5000
SELECT acquiring_company FROM media_mergers WHERE merger_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM media_mergers WHERE market_impact > 1000 ORDER BY merger_date DESC;
SELECT acquiring_company, COUNT(*) AS merger_count FROM media_mergers GROUP BY acquiring_company HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT media_company, acquiring_company, DATE_FORMAT(merger_date,'%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM media_mergers WHERE market_impact < 500 ORDER BY merger_date ASC;
SELECT media_company, acquiring_company, AVG(market_impact) AS avg_market_impact FROM media_mergers GROUP BY media_company, acquiring_company;
SELECT * FROM media_mergers WHERE merger_id IN (1, 3, 5, 7) OR market_impact BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT * FROM media_mergers;
SELECT media_company, merger_date FROM media_mergers ORDER BY merger_date DESC;
SELECT competitor_company, merger_type FROM media_mergers WHERE merger_type = 'Acquisition';
SELECT * FROM market_competition WHERE market_share > 30;
SELECT media_company, market_share, market_concentration FROM market_competition WHERE merger_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY market_share DESC;
SELECT * FROM media_mergers;
SELECT merger_id, merger_date, media_company FROM media_mergers WHERE merger_type = 'Vertical Merger';
SELECT competitor_company, media_company, market_share FROM market_competition ORDER BY market_share DESC;
SELECT media_company, market_share, market_concentration FROM market_competition WHERE merger_id IS NULL;
SELECT DISTINCT media_company FROM market_competition WHERE market_concentration > 50;
SELECT * FROM Media_Ownership;
SELECT company_name, owner FROM Media_Ownership WHERE industry = 'Media';
SELECT company_name, market_share, revenue FROM Market_Share ORDER BY market_share DESC;
SELECT company_name, market_concentration, competition_ranking FROM Competition_Indices WHERE market_concentration > 0.5;
SELECT company_name, market_share, market_entry_date FROM Market_Share WHERE market_share < 0.3;
SELECT company_name, industry FROM Media_Ownership ORDER BY industry
SELECT company_name, market_share, revenue FROM Market_Share WHERE market_entry_date > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY market_share DESC
SELECT DISTINCT owner FROM Media_Ownership
SELECT company_name, market_share FROM Market_Share WHERE revenue > 1000000 AND market_share > 0.2
SELECT company_name, market_concentration, herfindahl_index FROM Competition_Indices WHERE competition_ranking < 5 ORDER BY market_concentration
SELECT * FROM Media_Companies;
SELECT company_name FROM Media_Companies ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT company_name, company_id FROM Media_Companies WHERE company_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Media_Mergers WHERE merger_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT merger_id, acquired_company_id, acquiring_company_id FROM Media_Mergers ORDER BY merger_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM Media_Companies WHERE company_id = 1;
SELECT company_name FROM Media_Companies WHERE company_id > 1 ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT company_name, COUNT(*) AS merger_count FROM Media_Mergers JOIN Media_Companies ON acquiring_company_id = company_id GROUP BY company_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT Media_Companies.company_name, Market_Competition.competition_name FROM Media_Companies, Market_Competition WHERE Media_Companies.company_id = 2 AND Market_Competition.competition_id = 1;

SELECT Media_Companies.company_name, Market_Competition.competition_name, Market_Competition.competition_id FROM Media_Companies JOIN Competition_Analysis ON Media_Companies.company_id = Competition_Analysis.merger_id JOIN Market_Competition ON Competition_Analysis.competition_id = Market_Competition.competition_id WHERE Market_Competition.competition_id BETWEEN 1 AND 3 ORDER BY Media_Companies.company_name ASC, Market_Competition.competition_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM media_companies;
SELECT company_name, industry FROM media_companies WHERE revenue > 1000000;
SELECT company_name, revenue FROM media_companies ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM merger_details WHERE merger_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT acquiring_company_id, target_company_id, merger_value FROM merger_details WHERE merger_value >= 5000000;
SELECT * FROM media_companies WHERE industry='Technology';
SELECT company_name, revenue FROM media_companies ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT company_name, industry, revenue FROM media_companies WHERE revenue > 1000000 AND industry='Entertainment' ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT target_company_id, merger_date FROM merger_details WHERE merger_value > 5000000 AND merger_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM market_competition WHERE market_share BETWEEN 0.1 AND 0.5 ORDER BY market_share DESC, competition_level ASC;
